text: penny farthings I've only ever tried one
once they are quite easy to write
because they've got a very big front
wheel they only had a big front wheel
because chain technology hadn't
developed to the point where they could
drive the back wheel indirectly the
pedals are straight onto the wheel so to
get the gearing right the front wheel
has to be very big but the interesting
thing about penny farthings is they
generally have completely straight Forks
so you don't get much of that rake and
trail thing there is a little bit
because the steering head often has a
slight angle on it but despite having
such a massive wheel and being
inherently so stable they are very very
twitchy and you have got a palling
accidents falling off penny farthings
because you hundreds of feet up in the
air and Victorian safety helmets are

my opinion of cyclists on the road well
I approve bicycles because I haven't
been without one since I was about three
years old I hate people who bought a
bicycle two weeks ago and then start
lecturing me about it as if the rest of
the world has never heard of them or
doesn't realize what they're good for
they are good for local Jews I've done
some big bicycle rides I've cycle cycled
the length of Britain I've cycled from
London to Paris several times I've
cycled all the way across France through
the dewild Valley don't lecture me about
what bicycles are good for and how
they're going to save the earth because
I know and you can't carry a new
television on one or Avars
but basically bicycles are I think
actually bicycles are one of the most
important inventions of all time they
are a great liberator there's no there's
no cost at the point of uses I think the
marketing people would say and just need
to eat a Mars bar or something to make
sure you've got enough energy and then

efficiency of the human machine because
for a given amount of effort from your

I don't know why we didn't evolve with
